document.full_text: super bowl champions green bay packers will kick off the new nfl regular season against the new orleans saints at lambeau field on september 8 if the league and players can resolve a labor dispute that has left the season in jeopardy.
document.title: packers to kick off new nfl season against saints
lines_and_colors: super bowl champions green bay packers will kick off the new nfl regular season against the new orleans saints at lambeau field on september 8 if the league and players can resolve a labor dispute that has left the season in jeopardy.
